information: The company MZB METALL-ZERSPANUNG-GMBH BAUTZEN, is a Distributor, founded in 1997, which operates in the Iron, special grade and pig iron industry. It also operates in the Pipes and tubes - ferrous metal industries. It is based in Bautzen, Germany.
